SumDaily - How To Use SumDaily Article Summarizer?

Creation Date: August 25, 2023
Created By: Omar M.
​
​

# SumDaily - Article Summarizer

1. Find a desired article to read, and paste the URL into the box. - In this case we Click on Prigozhin, Wagner chief, believed to be on plane crash that killed 10: Live updates - The Washington Post (Recommended article 24/08/2023)

2. Once the desired article URL is pasted into the input box. Click on ↵.

3. Wait whilst the summarizer does it's job and extracts all the important information for you.

4. Finally, read through the distilled article - Congratulations! You've obtained the info you wanted and saved time!
